languages.text: All {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} dealing {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} have +1 damage, +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −5 to recoil.
